meanings.definition: The movement of chromosomes during cell division.
meanings.sent1: The diakineses of the chromosomes ensures proper cell division.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study diakineses to understand how cells divide.
meanings.sent3: The chromosomes decided to do a little diakineses dance during the cell party.
meanings.sent4: The diakineses of the chromosomes resembled a graceful ballet performance.
meanings.sent5: Watching the diakineses of chromosomes is like witnessing a tiny intricate ballet.

meanings.definition: The process of changing or transforming.
meanings.sent1: The diakineses of the caterpillar into a butterfly is fascinating.
meanings.sent2: Time brings about diakineses in nature, transforming landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The diakineses of the weather from sunny to rainy caught us by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her diakineses from a shy girl to a confident leader was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The diakineses of the caterpillar's metamorphosis is a beautiful example of change.
